examples: Travel broadens the mind.
The train traveled through beautiful countryside.
They travelled the highways and byways of Britain.
The news traveled across the country like lightning.
His travels brought him into contact with many famous artists.
words.defineEn: the act of going to a different place, usually a place that is far
words.defineVi: hành động đi đến một nơi khác, thường là một nơi xa

examples: Health services are lining the drug companies’ pockets, according to the report.
Mr. Perkins took the morning service.
Customer service calls went unanswered.
The local bus company only runs a skeleton service on Sundays.
The congregation gathered around the altar for the morning service.
words.defineEn: the work done by a person, organization, company, etc. for the benefit of others
words.defineVi: công việc được thực hiện bởi một người, tổ chức, công ty, v.v. vì lợi ích của người khác

examples: The rental agreement had an escape clause that allowed the tenant to terminate the lease early if they needed to move for work purposes.
Because to some degree, rental is kind of the earnings on a home.
So, for example, rental car prices are through the roof.
Fleet sales for rentals, taxicabs and ridesharing companies already make up a considerable portion of sales.
It would go towards rental assistance.
words.defineEn: the act of giving money to be able to use something like an apartment, house, car, or special equipment that is owned by another person
words.defineVi: hành động đưa tiền để có thể sử dụng thứ gì đó như căn hộ, nhà ở, ô tô hoặc thiết bị đặc biệt thuộc sở hữu của người khác

examples: See my car?
Our car has seen better days!
A car hit the barrier.
My father's car needs an oil change.
The car was doing 90 miles an hour.
words.defineEn: a road vehicle that has four wheels, an engine, and a small number of seats for people
words.defineVi: một phương tiện giao thông đường bộ có bốn bánh, một động cơ và một số ít chỗ ngồi cho người

examples: The taxi station is just a short walk from my apartment.
I took a taxi from my house to the train station.
The taxi driver helped me with my luggage.
The taxi dropped me off at the entrance of the restaurant.
The taxi driver drove us to the airport quickly and safely.
words.defineEn: a car that has a driver who gets paid for taking people to places
words.defineVi: một chiếc xe có tài xế được trả tiền để đưa mọi người đến những nơi

examples: After all, a bus is just a limo full of friends you haven’t met yet!
They flew me up there, put me in a limo.
When everyone was walking into their limos, names were being called out in a dark room with very little light.
I was just standing and waiting for my limo to arrive.
She brought it up when we were interviewing her, and she said you stood in front of the limo so it couldn’t leave.
words.defineEn: a long luxurious car with a partition between the passengers and the driver
words.defineVi: một chiếc ô tô dài sang trọng có vách ngăn giữa hành khách và tài xế

examples: The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
The hotel looks out over the harbor.
Hotel prices start at €80 for a double room.
The hotel offers a range of available room options to suit different budgets.
words.defineEn: a building where we give money to stay and eat food in when we are traveling
words.defineVi: một tòa nhà nơi chúng tôi cho tiền để ở và ăn đồ ăn khi chúng tôi đi du lịch

examples: The restaurant reservation is for 8 o'clock tonight.
We can hold your reservation for three days.
Is there a table available for dinner reservations tonight?
They asked for his last name at the hotel check-in, to confirm his reservation.
We should spell our last names when making reservations to avoid any misunderstandings.
words.defineEn: the act of arranging something, such as a place on an airplane, in a restaurant, or at a hotel to be kept for one to use later at a particular time
words.defineVi: hành động sắp xếp một cái gì đó, chẳng hạn như một địa điểm trên máy bay, trong một nhà hàng hoặc tại một khách sạn để được giữ cho một người sử dụng sau này vào một thời điểm cụ thể

examples: After all, a bus is just a limo full of friends you haven’t met yet!
They flew me up there, put me in a limo.
When everyone was walking into their limos, names were being called out in a dark room with very little light.
I was just standing and waiting for my limo to arrive.
She brought it up when we were interviewing her, and she said you stood in front of the limo so it couldn’t leave.
words.defineEn: a long luxurious car with a partition between the passengers and the driver
words.defineVi: một chiếc ô tô dài sang trọng có vách ngăn giữa hành khách và tài xế
